summary: Completed comprehensive testing of KarnaliX Master Admin Panel. All core features working correctly - Login, Dashboard, User Management, Games & Providers, Financials sections all functional with real API data.
critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for navigation items (nav-dashboard, nav-users, nav-games, etc.)
API endpoints are correctly integrated with frontend
Auth flow properly persists user state and redirects to /master-admin after login
seed_data_creation: Database has 1 master_admin user, 3 seeded games (Lucky Sevens, Blackjack Classic, Dice Master), 1 game provider. 2 TEST_admin users created during backend tests (suspended).
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Master Admin Panel features tested and working. Backend APIs: auth, dashboard/admin-stats, users, games, transactions/deposits, transactions/withdrawals, kyc/pending, support/tickets, bets all return correct data. Frontend navigation between Dashboard, User Management, Games & Providers, Financials sections all functional. Login flow works with admin@karnalix.com / Admin@12345.

login_flow.details: Login with admin@karnalix.com / Admin@12345 works, redirects to /master-admin

dashboard_overview.details: Shows real stats - Total Users: 3, Active Games: 3, Game Providers: 1, Financial Overview, Bet Statistics, KYC Status, Games Overview

user_management.details: Users table loads with search, role filter, Create User button, user actions (mint coins, suspend)

games_providers.details: Games tab shows 3 seeded games with details (Min/Max Bet, RTP), Providers tab shows 1 provider

financials.details: Stats cards, Mint Coins form, Deposits/Withdrawals/Transactions tabs all present

sidebar_navigation.details: All navigation items work - Dashboard, User Management, Games & Providers, Financials, KYC Management, Bet Management, Bonuses & Promos, Support Tickets, System Settings

admin_stats_api.details: Returns correct structure with users, coins, bets, deposits, withdrawals, kyc, support, games stats
